form.name: Your Name
form.message-received: Thank you for your message! We will contact you as soon as possible :)

home-page.section-1-1: We build custom software solutions to help you elevate your business.
home-page.section-1-2: Stack the odds in your favour with robust and scalable applications tailored to YOUR needs!
home-page.section-2-1: We are a one-stop shop for all your software needs: backend, frontend, mobile and even AI.
home-page.section-2-2: In the cloud or on-premise. We got this! :)
home-page.section-3-1: We use a battle-tested stack of modern technologies:
home-page.section-4-1: Our lean team is a mix of outstanding developers and experienced consultants.
home-page.section-4-2: We will be by your side all the way from project conception to deployment and beyond.
home-page.call-to-contact: Tell us how we can help you!

message-received.subject: Thank you for your message!
message-received.message-received: We appreciate you reaching out to us with your inquiry, here is the message you sent us:
message-received.closing-paragraph: Our team is currently reviewing your question, and we will get back to you as soon as possible.
